sentences.sentence_en: The water in the tropical lagoon was so transparent that we could see the fish.

sentences.sentence_en: A transparent government is essential for a healthy and functioning democracy.

sentences.sentence_en: The icons on the new smartphone interface are mostly self-explanatory.

sentences.sentence_en: The warning label on the chemical bottle is self-explanatory: Do not drink.

sentences.sentence_en: The company policy regarding remote work needs to be unambiguous to avoid confusion.
